hackathon-description-text: HackHERS is the annual, women-centric hackathon at Rutgers University, organized by Rutgers Women in Computer Science and The Douglass Project. We want to create a space in which women can explore tech culture and be empowered to create with code, and we invite everyone to help us achieve that.
hackathon-rules: Follow the MLH code of conduct:

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Financial Hack from Capital One
Best Visualization Tool Hack from Lockheed Martin
Best Hack for Social Good from J.P. Morgan Chase

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Jaybird headphones/Ninja blender/JBL speaker/ $100 Uber gift card
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Safety Reporting App from Exxon Mobil
